long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JMP Note: this addon is an extension of the main JMP application and provides little standalone capability JMP is an application which allows for simple & quick navigation to shared or personal bookmarks. By default, it requires a few manual steps to make the browser use it. This addon works to automate that setup and provide some additional features (e.g. address-bar suggestions). For more information about JMP, see the demo or the code View source
